类 Server.HandleSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server.HandleSession
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Runnable
    封闭类:
    Server

    class Server.HandleSession
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The inner class implements a client requests handler including several threads.

    • 方法详细资料

      • run

        public void run()
        Implements the run() method from the Runnable() interface. Starts the threads needed in the HandleSession Class.
        指定者:
        run 在接口中 java.lang.Runnable

      • createStreams

        private void createStreams()
        Creates I/O streams for the request handler.

      • getClientUserName

        private void getClientUserName()
        Gets and checks duplications of the name input by the clients.

      • listenForClientMessages

        private void listenForClientMessages()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        3 4 Keeps listening for the client messages.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O excpetion occurs when reading streams

      • processClientRequest

        boolean processClientRequest(java.lang.String rawCommand)
                      throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Processes the command from the client program.
        参数:
        rawCommand - the command read from the client
        返回:
        true if the command is not "quit", false if the command is invalid or "quit" command
        抛出:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the local host name could not be resolved into an address.

      • broadcast

        private void broadcast(java.lang.String message)
        broadcast the messages from one client to all but that originated one.
        参数:
        message - the message from th client who is chatting

      • getServerRunTime

        private java.lang.String getServerRunTime()
        Returns the running time of the server.
        返回:
        the server's total running time so far

      • getClientChatTime

        private java.lang.String getClientChatTime()
        Returns the connection time of a client in the chat room.
        返回:
        a system reply about the connection time

      • getConnectedClientsNumber

        private java.lang.String getConnectedClientsNumber()
        Returns the number of currently connected clients.
        返回:
        a system reply of the number

      • getTotalClientsNumber

        private java.lang.String getTotalClientsNumber()
        Returns the number of total connections so far.
        返回:
        a system reply of the number

      • getExceptionsNumber

        private java.lang.String getExceptionsNumber()
        Returns the number of the exceptions have benn thrown.
        返回:
        a system reply of the number of the thrown exceptions

      • getIPAddress

        private java.lang.String getIPAddress()
                               throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        Returns the server's IP address.
        返回:
        a system reply about the address
        抛出:
        java.net.UnknownHostException - if the local host name could not be resolved into an address.

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection(java.lang.String name)
        Closes the connection of the request handler from the server by shuting down the socket.
        参数:
        name - the client name used by the server to notify all others
